title: Hanairo Virgin Soil
sinopse: Our main character, Nagise, was asked to become the nude model for a product, who's concept is "The Sexual One". In order to get used to his body, Fumitaka Kuga offers to help, including allowing Nagise to stay at his apartment.... for a price. Now, Nagise must undergo rigorous sensual training everyday and must stay nude infront of Kuga.
